attributes.action: expand Southend Airport for the 2012 Olympics.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Olympics are only 5 years away, but London's main airports are already approaching capacity 5 years before so how will we get the extra people into London?
Southend Airport is currently a small and rarely used Airport about 35 miles away from the Olympic Site.
I think that using Southend Airport would be a good idea because with a train line right next door and with plans to build a station at Southend Airport, tourists can get off a plane, and within an hour, be at the Olympic Site.
And this would also improve the local economy of Southend for many years to come.
